content: add a touch of handmade charm to any project with this small crochet heart pattern this beginner-friendly design works up quickly using just a few basic stitches and a small amount of yarn each crochet heart applique measures about 2 5 inches 6 5 cm wide and tall the perfect size for adding a sweet personal touch to your handmade creations whether you re decorating for valentine s day or simply want to spread a little love year-round this quick pattern is a must-try
